channel.title: PI Specail bar (get to show up)
channel.description:
Difficulty 1/10
Working with : ItemAssistant
search for: [code]void sendweapon[/code]
then find the word whip under that.
it'll look like this:
[code] } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("whip")) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12290); c.getPA().sendFrame246(12291, 200, Weapon); c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 12293);[/code]
I want to add dark bow and flamberge.....
[code] } else if (WeaponName.endsWith("whip") || WeaponName2.toLowerCase().contains("Dark bow") || WeaponName2.toLowerCase().contains("flambe")) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12290); c.getPA().sendFrame246(12291, 200, Weapon); c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 12293);[/code] most important: it is capital sensitive, make sure you spelled right also in item.cfg and this will get it to show up, now i'd change [code] c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12290);[/code] to the right interface cause this is for flick and what not...
but I have googled and noone has answered this, i just found this out. this is how you add the special to show up, getting special to do something, just googled "how to add special bar" and that is how. lol.
all credits to PI
